location.address: Mail Stop 876106, SEMTE, Arizona State University

thesis.title: System Identification and Control Systems Engineering Approaches for Optimal and Practical Personalized mHealth Interventions for Physical Activity

work.name: Interactive Robotics Laboratory, Arizona State University
work.summary: Integrated LLMs and MPC in robotic arm control.; Devised novel approaches for natural language-driven reinforcement learning.
highlights: Explored natural language-driven reinforcement learning for sample-efficient policy search
Integrated LLM-based optimization with MPC for robotic arm trajectory planning
Mentored graduate students on VLA model fine-tuning and implementation for robotic applications

work.name: Control Systems Engineering Lab, Arizona State University
work.summary: Developed and applied model-based control in multidisciplinary mHealth interventions.
highlights: Led lab efforts on multiple NIH-funded studies
Led development of closed-loop control systems for large-scale behavioral interventions
Devised data-centric signal processing and model estimation algorithms outperforming traditional methods by 15%
Designed and implemented dynamic models and 3DoF Kalman filter-based hybrid MPC algorithms for personalized control
Utilized stochastic search methods to optimize feature and order selection, increasing computational efficiency by 3x

work.name: Third Evolution Inc.
work.summary: Process improvement and controls engineering for water treatment plants.
highlights: Characterized production anomalies, determined root causes, devised design improvements to address them, evaluated risk of implementation, and supervised their successful implementation in the field (doubling processing capacity in some cases)
Diagnosed and resolved control loop instabilities in industrial systems
Improved yield by ~10% and reduced oscillations by 20% through control loop tuning
Partnered with engineers on-site to generate SOPs and train operators, which reduced turnaround time by 25%
Ensured full compliance with EPA and safety regulations

publications.name: Data-Driven Mobile Health: System Identification and Hybrid Model Predictive Control to Deliver Personalized Physical Activity Interventions
publications.publisher: IEEE Open Journal of Control Systems

publications.name: Understanding “Just-in-Time” States in Behavioral Interventions using System Identification and Data Science Methods

projects.name: Autonomous Quadcopter Drone Landing
projects.description: Developed and simulated nonlinear control algorithms for quadcopter landing under ground effect using MATLAB/Simulink.

projects.name: NEAT Algorithm Implementation
projects.description: Built neural networks using the NEAT algorithm to solve control tasks in OpenAI environments (Python).

projects.name: Robotic Arm Control with LLMs
projects.description: Implemented LLM-based optimization for robotic arm trajectory planning, integrating with Model Predictive Control.

projects.name: Low Carbon Emission SMR Hydrogen Production
projects.description: Capstone project designing an efficient hydrogen production facility integrating SMR, PSA, and WGS technologies.
